1.text: Fill a container with lukewarm water and 1 US tbsp (15 mL) of detergent.

2.text: Hold your pillow underwater and gently squeeze it.

3.text: Rinse your pillow out in cool water until the water is clear.

4.text: Let your travel pillow dry in the sun.

5.text: Check the tag to see if your pillow is machine washable.

6.text: Remove the cover if it has one.

7.text: Wash the pillow or the cover in cold water on a low spin setting.

8.text: Dry it on low or let it sit in the sun for 1 day.

9.text: Let the pillow sit out in the sunlight for 2 to 3 days to remove smells.

10.text: Sprinkle baking soda on the pillow and let it sit to get rid of smells.

11.text: Rub detergent and warm water into small stains.
